name: Skelestial
description:
Built for the Ferris State University Digital Animation and Game Design Capstone Course.

Skelestial is an endless boss battle bullet hell mixed with the progression system of an incremental game such as cookie clicker. Fight an all powerful celestial entity to earn credits, make upgrades to your ship, and watch as the boss evolves alongside you for never ending action!

CONTROLS

WASD to move

Q and E to dash left and right

Left Mouse to shoot
